title: 3.5- The Assembly of Notables
itunes:title: 3.5- The Assembly of Notables
description: King Louis called the Assembly of Notables in early 1787 to approve a major fincancial reform package. But intead of rubber stamping the initiatives, the Notables scrutinized every detail.
